text:
@EricTrump Your dad took the time yesterday to stand in front of a pathetic 6,000 yawning people and show them he can drink water with one hand while bragging about having COVID-19 testing slowed down so numbers would look better.

You have absolutely not one thing to be proud of, do you?!
